name: *Limited Time* BonBons & Hard Candy (Holiday Gift Set)
description:
Our Limited Time Holiday Gift Set is for two of our best selling bonnets One Hard Candy and One BonBons Bonnet! Hurry While Supplies Last!

Hard Candy bonnets are custom fitted with a plastic interior that is waterproof. This design is perfect for deep conditioning and keeping pillow cases and furniture clean. Hard Candy bonnets are designed to be one-size fits all. Available in limited supplies. Handmade in America.

Our Black Taffy Hard Candy is a solid black satin bonnet with a Black & White striped ribbon. 

100% Charmeuse Satin BonBons bonnets are handmade and have a decorative ribbon bow. Available in limited supplies. Handmade in America.

Grape Jam BonBons Bonnets are Purple with a Purple/White bow. Also available Double-Lined with White satin ($15.00 USD more).

Want more room in your bonnet? Choose our "Extra Roomy" BonBons bonnets ($3.00 USD more).

name: Upside Down Cake BonBons Bonnet
description:
Our Upside Down Cake BonBons Bonnets combine simplicity with the benefit of a double-lined bonnet. What you are getting is 100% Charmeuse Satin that touches your hair with the smoothest (shiny) side of the satin fabric within a single-lined bonnet. 

BonBons Cheveux Boutique's Upside Down Cake BonBons Bonnet are solid in color and comes with a polka dot bow. Also available as Extra Roomy (add $3.00 USD).

Choose your color below:

name: Wraps (Lined)
description:
This BonBons Cheveux Boutique Wrap are 100% Charmeuse Satin and is designed to be one-size fits all. Available in limited supplies. Handmade in America.

Our Wraps are rectangular in shape and are lined with Charmeuse Satin and Cotton on the outside. Versatile wraps can be tied and worn in many different ways. You can fold lengthwise to make the wrap narrower while keeping the same full look of the bow, making it easy to wrap around short and long hair.

name: Creamy Coconut Vanilla Hair Icing 100% Natural
description:
Our 100% Natural Hair Icings are individually handmade. Available in limited supplies. Handmade in America.

Our New and Improved hair icings are now creamier and silky to the touch. Our hair icing is great for sealing in moisture which leaves your hair feeling super soft to the touch. Hair icing gives your hair wonderful shine, mends your split ends and has the aroma of Coconut & Vanilla our sweetest scent yet. All of our ingredients are 100% Natural and also can be used on the body.

Ingredients: Coconut Cream, Cupuacu Butter, Babassu Oil, Argan Oil, Hazelnut Oil, Almond Oil, Pro Vitamin B5, Sea Kelp, Rosemary, Deionized Water & Vanilla

Benefits:

Coconut Cream: Hydrates and protects hair while reducing breakage. Helps in boosting the hair growth, makes the hair soft and supple, makes the hair lustrous and healthy.

Cupuacu Butter: Benefits dry, damaged hair while protecting moisture and leaving hair soft and silky. 

Sweet Almond Oil: Prevents hair loss, provides shine and strengthens hair.

Babassu Oil: Gives curly hairs magnificent strength and elasticity from the roots down to the tips, leaving hair shiny and full of life.

Argan Oil: Nourishes damaged hair, encouraging hair growth.

Hazelnut Oil: Helps to tame dry or frizzy hair and moisturizes.

Sea Kelp: Helps Hair grow faster.

Jojoba Oil: Promotes new healthier hair and helps to strengthen the existing hair.

This product does not ship overseas.

name: Mint Chocolate Hair Icing 100% Natural
description:
Our 100% Natural Hair Icings are individually handmade. Available in limited supplies. Handmade in America.

Our New and Improved hair icings are now creamier and silky to the touch. Our hair icing is great for sealing in moisture which leaves your hair feeling super soft to the touch. Hair icing gives your hair wonderful shine, mends your split ends and has the aroma of mint chocolate. All of our ingredients are 100% Natural and also can be used on the body. 

Ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Coconut oil, Aloe Vera Leaf Juice, Castor oil, Olive oil, Avocado oil, Coconut Milk, Vitamin B, Sea Kelp, Vitamin E, Rosemary Extract, Deionized Water,and Essential Peppermint Oil.

Benefits:

Cocoa Butter: It is a moisturizer; it is very effective against dry, itchy scalp. it restores moisture without clogging the pores on your scalp cocoa butter stimulates the growth of hair follicles.

Shea Butter: Helps revitalize damaged hair and softens dry hair. In addition, it enhances hair growth because it is rich in essential vitamins and minerals.

Coconut Oil: Hydrates and protects hair while reducing breakage.

Aloe Vera Leaf Juice: Natural conditioner to deeply moisturize hair strands, helps prevent hair loss, helps control dandruff

Castor Oil: Promotes hair growth, promotes thicker hair.

Olive Oil: Condition and moisturizes hair.

Avocado oil: Rich in amino acids and antioxidants, nourishes damaged hair and encourages healthy growth of hair.

Coconut milk:  Helps in boosting the hair growth, makes the hair soft and supple, makes the hair lustrous and healthy.

Sea Kelp: Helps Hair grow faster.

THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT SHIP OVERSEAS.
